response.overview: In the ancient times, people discovered that the abuse of superpowers would only bring destruction and destruction to the world. The war of the Protoss in the West and the battle of the Chinese in the battles made the world completely ruined. Therefore, the superpowers of justice began to unite and suppress the evil. Those who are super-powerful, seal it, and Yandi Huangdi is one of them.
response.title: Heroic Awakening
